general.author: Paul Maergner, Marco von Raumer

file.description: The graphs to treat (packed in a zip file). WARNING: any uploaded files can be publically accessed! Do not upload any graphs (signatures) without permission!

number.name: numberN
number.description: Amount of reference graphs (0 to N)

select.name: sortMode
select.description: check file names for flags (f / g) to determine correct order. (signatures are rearranged such that genuine ones are first)

select.name: verificationMode
select.description: Faster, skips pure reference distances. (reference graphs are not compared against each other)

file.name: out
file.description: graph edit distances (ged, saved as csv)

number.name: numberR
number.description: Amount of reference signatures (0 to N)

number.name: numberG
number.description: Amount of genuine signatures (0 to N). Notice: only non-reference signatures are considered

select.name: verification
select.description: Requires 2 input files with same references. Verifies file 2 against file 1 (order is lexicographically determined)
